    1: import numpy as np
    2: import pytest
    3: 
    4: from pandas import (
    5:     CategoricalIndex,
    6:     Index,
    7: )
    8: import pandas._testing as tm
    9: 
   10: 
   11: @pytest.mark.parametrize("na_value", [None, np.nan])
   12: def test_difference_with_na(na_value):
   13:     # GH 57318
   14:     ci = CategoricalIndex(["a", "b", "c", None])
   15:     other = Index(["c", na_value])
   16:     result = ci.difference(other)
   17:     expected = CategoricalIndex(["a", "b"], categories=["a", "b", "c"])
   18:     tm.assert_index_equal(result, expected)
